TopicTitle: Does the dds image automatically get mapped to the mu file?

Articles.Content: So I'm making a mod, and I was wondering how to apply the texture to the model. Now I've read the files for different mods, so I'm kind of confused, as the cfg said nothing about where the different pieces of the dds need to be placed in the mu model. Any help will be appreciated.
